lessons.japanese: ですから信じることです。
lessons.indonesian: So you've got to be a believer.

lessons.japanese: それは本当に役にたつものですから、ぜひ買うべきです。
lessons.indonesian: It's really a very useful thing; you ought to buy it.

lessons.japanese: その箱をお持ちしましょう。重そうですから。
lessons.indonesian: Let me relieve you of that case. It looks heavy.

lessons.japanese: そのように時間を調整してあるのですから。
lessons.indonesian: That is the regular starting time.
